name: TweetDeck Dark Blue Compact
description:
This is TweetDeck with a dark theme and a small compression trick to make more room for the main feed.

Important note before installing: This theme will force columns 1 and 2 to share the same horizontal space and split the vertical in half. You may want to make this arrangement before installing. Additionally, your main feed should be #3.
additional_info:
Bear in mind, I'm a little new to TweetDeck so this is gonna be rough, for the first few versions. Additionally, other themes will have more features, so consider shopping around before settling on this one. There's still some work for me to do, here.

0.2: Drop down menus had text that was technically readable, but I felt that the colors were too dark, so I bumped up their shade a bit.
0.1: Initial commit.
